author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTH OFFSHORE BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR.. ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTH OFFSHORE BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR.. ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 AM PDT Fri Oct 10 the center of Priscilla was located near 25.9, -115.2 with movement N at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
